summary: Bill Lawrence wins a slew of prizes on a radio quiz program. His happiness is short-lived when he discovers he'll have to sell the prizes in order to pay the taxes on them.
cast: James Stewart|Barbara Hale|James Gleason|Fred Clark|Alan Mowbray|Patricia Medina|Natalie Wood|Tommy Rettig|Robert Gist|Lyle Talbot|Dorothy Adams|Walter Baldwin|Jay Barney|Robert Bice|John Bleifer|Frances Budd|Harry Carter|Ken Christy|Dick Cogan|Heinie Conklin|George Conrad|Dick Curtis|Dulce Day|Ann Doran|Robert Dudley|Sam Edwards|Estelle Etterre|June Evans|Fritz Feld|Eddie Firestone|Elizabeth Flournoy|Bess Flowers|Jerry Hausner|Harry Hines|Marjorie Holliday|Harry James|Billy Lechner|Caryl Lincoln|George Magrill|Valerie Mark|Mae Marsh|Jack Mather|Joan Miller|Billy Nelson|Peggy O'Connor|Tudor Owen|Franklin Parker|Milton Parsons|Joe Ploski|John Qualen|Jack Roper|Jewel Rose|John Roy|Carol Savage|Syd Saylor|Bigelow Sayre|Kathryn Sheldon|Kim Spalding|Claude Stroud|Charles Tannen|Andrew Tombes|Minerva Urecal|Philip Van Zandt|Colin Ward|Guy Way|Billy Wayne|William Woodson
title: Cuidado con los inspectores
